code: xct_bib_keys_missing(path_bib, citations)  xct_bib_keys_extract(path_bib)  xct_keys_guess_match(   keys_missing,   keys_bib,   stringdist_threshold = 5,   stringdist_method = "osa",   no_match_rows_include = FALSE )

title: Check for Missing Citation Keys in a BibTeX File — xct_bib_keys_missing
text: path_bib file path bibliography file (.bib) used citation keys. Defaults "references.bib" current working directory. keys_missing character vector citation keys missing BibTeX file. Typically obtained using xct_bib_keys_missing(). keys_bib character vector citation keys extracted BibTeX file. Typically obtained using xct_bib_keys_extract(). stringdist_threshold numeric maximum allowable string distance match considered valid. value passed stringdist::stringdist() specified method. Distances non-negative numeric values smaller values indicate greater similarity. short strings (5-10 characters), use 1-3; medium strings (10-20 characters), use 3-7; longer strings (>20 characters), use 7-15. Default 5. stringdist_method character method used stringdist::stringdist() calculate string distances. Options include "osa" (Optimal String Alignment, default), "lv" (Levenshtein), "dl" (Damerau-Levenshtein), "jw" (Jaro-Winkler), others. See stringdist::stringdist() documentation details. no_match_rows_include logical Whether include rows keys valid matches output. Default FALSE, excludes rows. keys character vector citation keys check BibTeX file.

title: Check for Missing Citation Keys in a BibTeX File — xct_bib_keys_missing
text: vector citation keys missing BibTeX file. Returns empty vector citation keys found. character vector citation keys extracted BibTeX file. data frame two columns: key_missing missing citation keys. key_missing_guess_match guessed closest matching citation keys (NA valid match found). no_match_rows_include = FALSE, rows valid matches excluded.

title: Check for Missing Citation Keys in a BibTeX File — xct_bib_keys_missing

The following citations were not found in the BibTeX file: #> [1] "busch_etal2011LandscapeLevelModel" "kirsch_etal2014Fishinventoryb"     #> [3] "test2001"                           # Guess matches for missing keys with a string distance threshold and method xct_keys_guess_match(keys_missing, keys_bib) #> ! No valid match found for the following keys (closest distance exceeds 5 ): test2001 #>                         key_missing            key_missing_guess_match #> 1 busch_etal2011LandscapeLevelModel busch_etal2011LandscapeLevelModela #> 2     kirsch_etal2014Fishinventoryb       kirsch_etal2014Fishinventory
